languages.text: {n}Сильный. Матерый. Большие руки, чьих ударов страшатся. Большое брюхо, ставшее символом его успешности. Он не голодает, значит и те, кто слушает его, не будут голодать. Вожак, признанный стаей.{/n}

{n}Strong. Heavy. Enormous hands whose blows should be feared. A great belly that has become a symbol of his success. He does not starve, so those who follow him will not starve either. A powerful leader, recognised by the whole pack.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сильный. Матерый. Большие руки, чьих ударов страшатся. Большое брюхо, ставшее символом его успешности. Он не голодает, значит и те, кто слушает его, не будут голодать. Вожак, признанный стаей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Strong. Massive. Large hands whose blows are to be feared. A great belly that has become a symbol of his success. He does not starve, so those who follow him will not starve either. A powerful leader who is recognised by the pack.{/n}

{n}Strong. Massive. Large hands whose blows are to be feared. A great belly that has become a symbol of his success. He does not starve, so those who follow him will not starve either. A powerful leader who is recognised by the pack.{/n}

{n}Strong. Heavy. Enormous hands whose blows should be feared. A great belly that has become a symbol of his success. He does not starve, so those who follow him will not starve either. A powerful leader, recognised by the whole pack.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Stark. Schwer. Enorme Hände, deren Schläge zu fürchten sind. Ein dicker Bauch, der zum Symbol seines Erfolgs geworden ist. Er hungert nicht, und das gilt auch für alle, die ihm folgen. Ein mächtiger Anführer, der vom gesamten Rudel anerkannt wird.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Strong. Heavy. Enormous hands whose blows should be feared. A great belly that has become a symbol of his success. He does not starve, so those who follow him will not starve either. A powerful leader, recognised by the whole pack.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Stark. Schwer. Enorme Hände, deren Schläge zu fürchten sind. Ein dicker Bauch, der zum Symbol seines Erfolgs geworden ist. Er hungert nicht, und das gilt auch für alle, die ihm folgen. Ein mächtiger Anführer, der vom gesamten Rudel anerkannt wird.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Fuerte. Pesado. Manos enormes cuyos golpes merecen ser temidos. Una amplia barriga que se ha convertido en el símbolo de su éxito. Él no pasa hambre, de modo que sus seguidores tampoco lo harán. Un líder poderoso, reconocido por toda la manada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Strong. Heavy. Enormous hands whose blows should be feared. A great belly that has become a symbol of his success. He does not starve, so those who follow him will not starve either. A powerful leader, recognised by the whole pack.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Fuerte. Pesado. Manos enormes cuyos golpes merecen ser temidos. Una amplia barriga que se ha convertido en el símbolo de su éxito. Él no pasa hambre, de modo que sus seguidores tampoco lo harán. Un líder poderoso, reconocido por toda la manada.{/n}

languages.text: {n}強くて、重量級。巨大な手が放つ一撃を甘く見てはいけない。その存在感のある腹は成功の証だ。飢えを知らぬその男に従う者もまた、飢えることはない。集団の誰もが認める力強いリーダーだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Strong. Heavy. Enormous hands whose blows should be feared. A great belly that has become a symbol of his success. He does not starve, so those who follow him will not starve either. A powerful leader, recognised by the whole pack.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}強くて、重量級。巨大な手が放つ一撃を甘く見てはいけない。その存在感のある腹は成功の証だ。飢えを知らぬその男に従う者もまた、飢えることはない。集団の誰もが認める力強いリーダーだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}他体格硕大，肌肉结实，巨大的双手孔武有力。他挺着硕大的啤酒肚，这俨然已经成为了他身份的象征。他没有挨饿，所以那些追随他的人也不会挨饿。他是位强大的领袖，已经得到了整个族群的认可。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Strong. Heavy. Enormous hands whose blows should be feared. A great belly that has become a symbol of his success. He does not starve, so those who follow him will not starve either. A powerful leader, recognised by the whole pack.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他体格硕大，肌肉结实，巨大的双手孔武有力。他挺着硕大的啤酒肚，这俨然已经成为了他身份的象征。他没有挨饿，所以那些追随他的人也不会挨饿。他是位强大的领袖，已经得到了整个族群的认可。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Fort. Lourd. Des mains comme des battoirs, capables de frapper durement. Un ventre énorme devenu le symbole de son succès. Il mange à sa faim, et ceux qui le suivent en font autant. Un chef puissant, reconnu par toute la meute.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Strong. Heavy. Enormous hands whose blows should be feared. A great belly that has become a symbol of his success. He does not starve, so those who follow him will not starve either. A powerful leader, recognised by the whole pack.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Fort. Lourd. Des mains comme des battoirs, capables de frapper durement. Un ventre énorme devenu le symbole de son succès. Il mange à sa faim, et ceux qui le suivent en font autant. Un chef puissant, reconnu par toute la meute.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Güçlü ve ağır. Vuracağı darbelerle yüreklere dehşet salacak devasa eller, başarısının sembolü hâline gelmiş büyük bir göbek... Açlık nedir bilmiyor, onu takip edenler de açlıkla yüzleşmiyor. Tüm cemaat tarafından tanınan, kuvvetli bir lider.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Strong. Heavy. Enormous hands whose blows should be feared. A great belly that has become a symbol of his success. He does not starve, so those who follow him will not starve either. A powerful leader, recognised by the whole pack.{/n}
